text: Randolph William Thrower (September 5, 1913 - March 8, 2014) was an American lawyer. He was the Commissioner of Internal Revenue under President Richard Nixon from 1969 to 1971. Category:Commissioners of Internal Revenue Category:1913 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Tampa, Florida Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:United States Marine Corps personnel
title: Randolph W. Thrower
